public final class QSetWrite
extends DBCommon
implements AuthorConstants, QuestionsRWConstants

All the write operations for topics and question sets.

putHeader

public static void putHeader(String key,
                             String header)
                      throws DBException
Replaces an existing header with a new one. Used to convert UTF-8 text into ASCII with character entity representations.

Parameters:
